content.query:
-- Drop view if it exists
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE name = 'FranceView')
    DROP VIEW FranceView;
GO

-- Create the view reading all Parquet files in the folder
CREATE VIEW FranceView AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://dlbankcustomerchurn.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/Bank_Churn/geography=France/',
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
) AS result;
GO
